title: transactions-by-channel
description: common json schema for transaction volumes tagged by user channel

_id.description: unique url-friendly base64 encoded, utf8 endoded concatenation identifier

_timestamp.description: ISO8601 combined date and time in UTC e.g. '2014-12-01T00:00:00+00:00'

period.description: The period covered by each data point from the _timestamp

count.description: the number of completed transactions over the specific channel
